document: The New England Colonists' English Image, 1550-1714 By David Hudson Corkran III A.B. (Middlebury College) 1957 M.A. (University of California) 1960 DISSERTATION Submitted in partial satisfaction of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in History in the GRADUATE DIVISION of the UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, BERKELEY Approved: Committee in Charge Degree conferred DEGREE CONFERRED MARCH 24, 1970 Date
